title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2601.14 - Appeals: where to file
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2601.14 - Appeals: where to file

State Regulations

Any applicant denied access to a record may appeal such
denial, pursuant to the procedure heretofore described, by directing such
appeal to the General Counsel, New York State Environmental Facilities

Corporation, 625 Broadway, Albany, NY 12207-2997. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
2601.14

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
